conditions.name: Psoriasis
conditions.suggestion: IMPORTANT: Early treatment prevents spreading. Common tablets: Methotrexate (7.5-15mg weekly) - take with folic acid (1mg daily), Acitretin (10-25mg daily) for severe cases, Apremilast (30mg twice daily) for moderate-severe cases. WARNING: Protect skin from injury. Topical treatments, phototherapy, lifestyle changes essential for management.

conditions.name: Eczema (Atopic Dermatitis)
conditions.suggestion: CAUTION: Avoid scratching affected areas. Common tablets: Antihistamines - Cetirizine (10mg daily) or Hydroxyzine (25mg at bedtime) for itching, Prednisone (5-60mg) for severe flares. ALERT: Watch for signs of infection. Use prescribed antibiotics if infected. Maintain strict moisturizing routine.

conditions.name: Acne Vulgaris
conditions.suggestion: IMPORTANT: Don't pop pimples - increases scarring risk. Common tablets: Isotretinoin (20-40mg daily) for severe cases - REQUIRES MONITORING, Doxycycline (50-100mg daily), Spironolactone (25-100mg daily) for hormonal acne. REMINDER: Sun protection crucial, especially with medications.

conditions.name: Rosacea
conditions.suggestion: TRIGGER ALERT: Identify and avoid personal triggers. Common tablets: Doxycycline (40-100mg daily) - anti-inflammatory dose, Isotretinoin (10-20mg daily) for severe cases. WARNING: Sun exposure can worsen symptoms. Use broad-spectrum sunscreen daily.

conditions.name: Contact Dermatitis
conditions.suggestion: URGENT: Identify and remove contact trigger. Common tablets: Antihistamines - Fexofenadine (180mg daily) or Loratadine (10mg daily), Prednisone (20-40mg) for severe reactions. IMPORTANT: Document suspected triggers to prevent future exposure.
